senses.de: ask for advice or information from someone
senses.ex: I need to consult a lawyer about this contract.

Tips.title: Professional Context
Tips.description: Use 'consult' when seeking expert advice for important matters.
Tips.example: We should consult a tax advisor for these financial documents.

Tips.title: Ask Privately
Tips.description: 'Consult' implies a private conversation, not a public discussion.
Tips.example: She consulted her mentor in a one-on-one meeting.

Tips.title: Expect Expertise
Tips.description: Typically, you consult someone who has specialized knowledge.
Tips.example: Consult an architect when designing your new home.

senses.de: referring to a book or source for information
senses.ex: Let me consult the user guide to see how to handle this error.

Tips.title: Use for Clarity
Tips.description: Consult sources like manuals or guides when instructions are unclear.
Tips.example: If the software installation fails, consult the troubleshooting section.

Tips.title: Solve Problems
Tips.description: Consult a resource to figure out a problem or learn something specific.
Tips.example: Consult the cookbook to find a recipe for cheesecake.

senses.de: discuss something with others before making a decision
senses.ex: We have to consult the team before making any big changes.

Tips.title: Group Decisions
Tips.description: Use 'consult' when a decision needs input from multiple people.
Tips.example: The manager needs to consult the entire team on this matter.

Tips.title: Respect Opinions
Tips.description: Consulting shows respect for others' opinions and knowledge.
Tips.example: The director consulted with the staff before changing the policy.

senses.ex: She consults for several large corporations.

Tips.title: Expert Services
Tips.description: 'Consult' can mean offering professional expertise to others.
Tips.example: After retiring, he began to consult for small businesses.

Tips.title: Business Relationship
Tips.description: Consulting can describe a professional, often ongoing, business support.
Tips.example: Her firm consults on both marketing strategy and public relations.

Advise.wordDefinition:
Advise means to give suggestions or recommendations to someone about what they should do in a certain situation. For example, a doctor might advise a patient to exercise more.

Advise is used when you are giving guidance to someone, while consult is used when you are seeking guidance from someone else who is more knowledgeable in a particular area.

Consider.wordDefinition:
Consider means to think carefully about something before making a decision. For example, you might consider which college to attend or which movie to watch.

Consider means to think about something on your own, while consult means to seek advice from someone else.

Counsel.wordDefinition:
Counsel means to provide guidance or advice on a personal or emotional level. It's applicable in situations where someone needs help or support dealing with personal, emotional, or psychological issues.

For example, a person might seek counsel from a therapist or religious leader to help them work through personal challenges or crises.

Consult deals with seeking expert advice or information while counsel deals with providing guidance and support on personal or emotional matters.

Discuss.wordDefinition:
Discuss means to talk with someone about a topic, usually to exchange ideas, opinions, and information. This is most applicable when you want to have a conversation with someone about a shared topic or to explore different perspectives on a particular issue.

Consult is seeking advice from an expert while discuss is exchanging ideas with someone.

Enquire.wordDefinition:
You consult an expert in your field when you need specific guidance or advice, while you enquire from a teacher about the academic performance of your friend.

You consult an expert when you need guidance, and you enquire to clear doubts or seek information.

Examine.wordDefinition:
Examine means to inspect or scrutinize something carefully in order to understand it better or to find out if there is a problem.

It is usually used when someone wants to investigate something more deeply. For example, a doctor may examine a patient to diagnose an illness or a scientist may examine a sample of water to test for pollution.

Consult is used when someone wants to get advice or information from an expert, while examine is used when someone wants to investigate or inspect something in detail.

Review.wordDefinition:
Review means to examine or evaluate something, usually with the intention of providing feedback or making a judgment. It is applicable when someone wants to assess the quality or performance of something, such as a product, service, or work of art.

In simpler terms, consult means to ask for help or advice, while review means to take a closer look and make an assessment.

Turn to.wordDefinition:
Consult typically refers to seeking advice or guidance from a professional or expert in a particular field. For example, you might consult a doctor for medical advice or a lawyer for legal advice.

Turn to can be used more broadly to refer to seeking help, support, or guidance from anyone or anything. For example, you might turn to a friend for emotional support, turn to a book for guidance, or turn to a religious figure for spiritual guidance.

Consult is more specific and typically involves seeking advice from a professional or expert in a particular field, while turn to is more general and can refer to seeking help or guidance from anyone or anything.

quotes.Text: I think women have the right to consult their own wishes, needs, and capacities and produce only loved, wanted children they can care for - or even no children at all. I think we would all be better off as a society if we respected women's ability to make these decisions for themselves and concentrated on caring well for the born.
quotes.Title: American Poet
quotes.Name: Katha Pollitt

quotes.Text: It's important, according to me, to train in small doses so as to not lose the joy of playing chess. I personally think too many coaching and training classes may take away a child's interest in the game itself. The essential thing to do is practise often and, in case of a doubt, to consult a trainer.
quotes.Title: Indian Celebrity
quotes.Name: Viswanathan Anand

quotes.Text: I'll never get out of politics. I have friends in public office. I have things that I want to do. You can't go back in life. I won't go back to the existence I had before of running a political consulting firm and signing up clients and advising campaigns in exactly that way.
quotes.Title: American Politician
quotes.Name: Karl Rove

quotes.Text: Scientific corporations might well become almost independent states and be enabled to undertake their largest experiments without consulting the outside world - a world which would be less and less able to judge what the experiments were about.
quotes.Title: Irish Scientist
quotes.Name: John Desmond Bernal

quotes.Text: Life is a game with many rules but no referee. One learns how to play it more by watching it than by consulting any book, including the holy book. Small wonder, then, that so many play dirty, that so few win, that so many lose.
quotes.Title: American Poet
quotes.Name: Joseph Brodsky

quotes.Text: I did film and television, not having worked in banking or consulting, a very different stream. So I said, 'I'll go to business school, and it will help me decide more on what I want to do.
quotes.Title: Indian Businesswoman
quotes.Name: Roshni Nadar

quotes.Text: Well, it's still a bit uncertain, but I will do the consulting, and I'll see how I can contribute. But I'm sure whatever I do will involve the space program. That's where my passion is.
quotes.Title: American Astronaut
quotes.Name: Leroy Chiao

quotes.Text: Two things are vital for me. I've always had people who protected me, and I've always had people who helped me. Before I decide, I consult with three, four people who I trust.
quotes.Title: Swiss Businessman
quotes.Name: Hansjorg Wyss

quotes.Text: I turn to my parents for support, but their lives and careers are different and mine is different, so I don't consult them regarding my career. I make my own choices.
quotes.Title: Indian Actress
quotes.Name: Shruti Haasan

quotes.Text: Every year in consulting is like three years in the corporate world because you have multiple clients, multiple issues - you grow so much.
quotes.Title: Indian Businesswoman
quotes.Name: Indra Nooyi
